Verses: 1 piriyamaanavargale, Indha Irandaam Nirubaththai Ippozhudhu Ungalukku Ezhudhukiren.

2 parisuththa Theerkkadharisigalaal Munsollappatta Vaarththaigalaiyum, Ratchagaraayirukkira Karththarudaiya Apposthalaraagiya Engaludaiya Kattalaigalaiyum Neengal Ninaivukoorumpadi Indha Nirupangalinaal Ungal Unmaiyaana Manadhai Ninaippootti Ezhuppugiren.
3 mudhalaavadhu Neengal Ariyavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Kadaisinaatkalil Pariyaasakkaarar Vandhu, Thangal Suyaichchaigalinpadiye Nadandhu,
4 avar Varuvaar Endru Sollugira Vaakkuththaththam Enge? Pithaakkal Niththiraiyadaindhapinbu Sagalamum Sirushtippin Thotramudhal Irundhavidhamaayirukkiradhe Endru Solluvaargal.
5 poorvakaalaththil Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaiyinaale Vaanangalum, Jalaththinindru Thondri Jalaththinaale Nilaikondirukkira Poomiyum Undaayinavenbadhaiyum,
6 appozhudhu Irundha Ulagam Jalappiralayaththinaale Azhindhadhenpadhaiyum Manadhaara Ariyaamalirukkiraargal.

7 ippozhudhu Irukkira Vaanangalum Boomiyum Andha Vaarththaiyinaaleye Akkinikku Iraiyaaga Vaikkappattu, Dhevabakthiyillaadhavargal Niyaayantheerkkappattu Azhindhupogum Naalvaraikkum Kaakkappattirukkiradhu.
8 piriyamaanavargale, Karththarukku Orunaal Aayiramvarushampolavum, Aayiramvarusham Orunaalpolavum Irukkiradhengira Indha Oru Kaariyaththai Neengal Ariyaadhirukkavendaam.

9 thaamadhikkiraar Endru Silar Ennukirapati Karththar Thamadhu Vaakkuththaththaththaikkuriththuth Thaamadhamaayiraamal; Oruvarum Kettuppogaamal Ellaarum Mananthirumbavendumendru Virumbi, Nammel Neediya Porumaiyullavaraayirukkiraar.
10 karththarudaiya Naal Iravile Thirudan Varugiravidhamaai Varum; Appozhudhu Vaanangal Madamada Endru Agandrupom, Boodhangal Vendhu Urugippom, Boomiyum Adhilulla Kiriyaigalumerindhu Azhindhupom.
11 ippadi Ivaigalellaam Azhindhupogiradhaayirukkirapadiyaal Neengal Eppadippatta Parisuththa Nadakkaiyum Dhevabakthiyum Ullavargalaayirukkavendum!
12 dhevanudaiya Naal Seekkiramaai Varumpadikku Migundha Aavalode Kaaththirungal; Andha Naalil Vaanangal Vendhu Azhindhu, Boodhangal Erindhu Urugippom.
13 avarudaiya Vaakkuththaththaththinpadiye Needhi Vaasamaayirukkum Pudhiya Vaanangalum Pudhiya Boomiyum Undaagumendru Kaaththirukkirom.
14 aagaiyaal, Piriyamaanavargale, Ivaigal Varak Kaaththirukkira Neengal Karaiyatravargalum Pizhaiyillaadhavargalumaaich Samaadhaanaththode Avar Sannidhiyil Kaanappadumpadi Jaakkiradhaiyaayirungal.
15 melum Nammudaiya Karththarin Neediyaporumaiyai Ratchippendru Ennungal; Namakkup Piriyamaana Sagodharanaagiya Pavulum Thanakku Arulappatta Gnaanaththinaale Ippadiye Ungalukku Ezhudhiyirukkiraan;

16 ellaa Nirubangalilum Ivaigalaikkuriththup Pesiyirukkiraan; Avan Sonnavaigalil Sila Kaariyangal Arigiradharku Aridhaayirukkiradhu; Kallaadhavargalum Urudhiyillaadhavargalum Matra Vedhavaakkiyangalaip Purattugiradhupolath Thangalukkuk Keduvaraththakkadhaaga Ivaigalaiyum Purattugiraargal.

17 aadhalaal Piriyamaanavargale, Ivaigalai Munname Neengal Arindhirukkirapadiyaal, Akkiramakkaararudaiya Vanjagaththile Neengal Izhuppundu Ungal Urudhiyilirundhu Vilagi Vizhundhupogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu,
18 nammudaiya Karththarum Ratchagarumaagiya Yesukiristhuvin Kirubaiyilum Avarai Arigira Arivilum Valarungal. Avarukku Ippozhudhum Endrendraikkum Magimaiyundaavadhaaga. Aamen.
